title: Pagani Huayra: Test Drive in Italy - /CHRIS HARRIS ON CARS
description: Chris Harris flies to Italy to be one of the first journalists behind the wheel of the new Pagani Huayra. A 24 hour trip to Modena and a proper drive in the 730hp Huayra.
tags: Pagani Huayra, Chris Harris, first drive
